message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Let's split it evenly this time. It's the fairest way to go.
Bob, time is money. My offer is still on the table, but it won't last forever. This is your chance to secure a decent share before inflation eats away at your potential gains.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more than 35% to make this worthwhile. This is my final offer.
